channel.title: What the fuck? Some guy on another forum is copypasting my posts
channel.description:
[url]https://forums.gearboxsoftware.com/showpost.php?p=2532817&postcount=17[/url]
Thought this was kinda funny and disturbing, but some random guy on a different forum copy-pasted my posts word for word, even leaves the dashes in.
I mean wtf? I thought it was kinda funny but also pretty creepy. Like a friggin internet stalker or something.
Still does make me lol tho.

item.title: What the fuck? Some guy on another forum is copypasting my posts
item.dc:creator: Collision
item.description:
Wouldn’t be funny anymore?

It wasn’t funny to start with.

Stop trying so hard and go take a nap on a road somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: What the fuck? Some guy on another forum is copypasting my posts

item.description:
Oh no, some person I don’t care about is steal another persons, who surprisingly I don’t care about, posts.

Dear oh dear, what ever shall we do.

Oh, I have an idea.

Harden the fuck up and pull the fucking tampon out of your vagina.
